content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia 
function extract_julia_code(md::AbstractString) 
    lines = split(md, r"\n\n+")
    code_blocks = []
    current_block = []

    for line in lines
        if startswith(line, r"^```")
            pushfirst!(code_blocks, join(current_block, "\n"))
            current_block = [line]
        elseif endswith(line, r"^```")
            push!(current_block, line)
        else
            push!(current_block, line)
        end
    end

    push!(code_blocks, join(current_block, "\n"))
    join(code_blocks, "\n\n")
end
```

This function `extract_julia_code` processes the given markdown string `md` and extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks together with a newline. It returns a single string containing all the extracted code blocks.
